Package arc.util.io

Class Writes

java.lang.Object
arc.util.io.Writes
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class Writes
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
A wrapper for DataOutput with more concise method names and no IOExceptions.
